name: biederman-wp-theme
description: Biederman WordPress theme with custom Gutenberg blocks

scripts.build: wp-scripts build blocks/hero/src/index.js --output-path=blocks/hero/build && wp-scripts build blocks/show-featured/src/index.js --output-path=blocks/show-featured/build && wp-scripts build blocks/show-list/src/index.js --output-path=blocks/show-list/build && wp-scripts build blocks/press-assets/src/index.js --output-path=blocks/press-assets/build && wp-scripts build blocks/social-links/src/index.js --output-path=blocks/social-links/build && wp-scripts build blocks/contact-form/src/index.js --output-path=blocks/contact-form/build && wp-scripts build blocks/facts/src/index.js --output-path=blocks/facts/build
scripts.start: wp-scripts start blocks/hero/src/index.js --output-path=blocks/hero/build & wp-scripts start blocks/show-featured/src/index.js --output-path=blocks/show-featured/build & wp-scripts start blocks/show-list/src/index.js --output-path=blocks/show-list/build & wp-scripts start blocks/press-assets/src/index.js --output-path=blocks/press-assets/build & wp-scripts start blocks/social-links/src/index.js --output-path=blocks/social-links/build & wp-scripts start blocks/contact-form/src/index.js --output-path=blocks/contact-form/build & wp-scripts start blocks/facts/src/index.js --output-path=blocks/facts/build
